== Kubuntu 15.04 Alpha 1 ==

Kubuntu 15.04 Alpha 1 is available for testing.  Try it out now if you want to help debug before our release in April 2015.

{| class="wikitable"
|-
| <tablestyle="background:#D2FCFF; margin: 0 0 1em 1em;" style="width:50%; padding:0.5em;"> '''Upgrading from 14.10'''
| '''Download a Disk Image'''
|-
| To upgrade to Kubuntu 15.04 pre-releases from 14.10, run '''kubuntu-devel-release-upgrade''' from a command line.<<BR>>  <nowiki>[[https://help.ubuntu.com/community/UtopicUpgrades/Kubuntu|Full instructions to upgrade from 14.10]]</nowiki>.
| Download a <nowiki>[[http://cdimage.ubuntu.com/kubuntu/releases/vivid|Bootable image]]</nowiki> and put it onto a <nowiki>[[https://help.ubuntu.com/community/BurningIsoHowto|DVD]]</nowiki> or <nowiki>[[https://help.ubuntu.com/community/Installation/FromUSBStick|USB Drive]]</nowiki>
|}

== Feedback ==

Development of Kubuntu 15.04, the Vivid Vervet, is ongoing and bugs are fixed every day.  Before reporting bugs, please ensure your system is up to date.  For verifying installation related bugs, updated disk images are available from <nowiki>[[http://cdimage.ubuntu.com/kubuntu/daily-live/current/|Daily bootable images for standard PCs/laptops/netbooks]]</nowiki>.

You can give us feedback on <nowiki>[[https://plus.google.com/u/0/107577785796696065138/posts|Google +]]</nowiki><nowiki>[[https://plus.google.com/u/0/107577785796696065138/posts|<nowiki>[[File:Kubuntu-Gplus.png]]</nowiki></nowiki>]] or <nowiki>[[https://www.facebook.com/kubuntu.org|Facebook]]</nowiki><nowiki>[[https://www.facebook.com/kubuntu.org|<nowiki>[[File:Kubuntu-FB.png]]</nowiki></nowiki>]] or <nowiki>[[https://twitter.com/kubuntu|Twitter]]</nowiki><nowiki>[[https://twitter.com/kubuntu|<nowiki>[[File:Kubuntu-Twitter.png]]</nowiki></nowiki>]] or <nowiki>[[https://www.linkedin.com/company/kubuntu|Linkedin]]</nowiki> <nowiki>[[https://www.linkedin.com/company/kubuntu|<nowiki>[[File:Kubuntu-linkedin.png]]</nowiki></nowiki>]].
